colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG GNAM BSGOS GONG MA'I LUNG GIS SNGAGS SHING ZHVA SER BSTAN PA LA MI PHYED PA'I DAD @003B STOBS DANG LDAN PA KHAL KHA GA-YAS RU'I AAM BAN SAN NO YON CHING WANG TSE RING RDO RJE DANG, AER TE NI PAndI TA HU THOG THU MKHAN CHEN NO MIN HAN GYI PHYAG MDZOD JA SAG BLA MA GRAGS PA TSUL KHRIMS, MKHAN PO BLA MA, LAS SNE, GRVA BYINGS, THO YON SKAL BZANG TSE DPAL, SHAR GLING MKHAN PO NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG BSAM @004A GTAN, GSOL DPON BLO BZANG MGON PO, RDO RAB 'BYAMS PA BUDDHA SKYABS, AAM PAN SAN NO YON GYI SHOG DKA' CHEN SKAL BZANG TSUL KHRIMS RNAMS NAS BSKUL NGOR, ^SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DPAL LDAN BSTAN PA'I NYI MA PHYOGS LAS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG POS SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
